document.full_text: pakistan must prove to the united states that it did not know al qaeda leader osama bin laden was hiding in a compound in an affluent neighborhood near the capital of islamabad, a top u.s. lawmaker said on monday.
document.title: pressure on pakistan after bin laden death: lawmaker
lines_and_colors: pakistan must prove to the united states that it did not know al qaeda leader osama bin laden was hiding in a compound in an affluent neighborhood near the capital of islamabad, a top u.s. lawmaker said on monday.
